txt.en: Collected the helms of the fallen ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
The Rangers have requested help in securing the lands around Esteldín and warding off any threats.
Collected the helms of the fallen ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

The Orcs in the ravaged lands of Dol Dínen have become bold, pillaging much further north where they hold no lands.

Whoever is bold enough to bring the battle back to their camps and recover the helms of their victims shall be rewarded. The Orcs of the ravaged lands are not to be counted lightly.

The kindred of Rangers are stretched thin across the North Downs and beyond on missions of great import, and are unable to deal with this threat.

<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: This is a fellowship quest.</rgb>

The Orcs make their camp in the ravaged lands of Dol Dínen, far to the south-east of Esteldín.\n\nNot every traveller or resident of the North Downs has your good fortune and skill. Some have fallen to sword or spear of the twisted Orc-hordes. You should hunt Orcs in the ravaged lands and reclaim the helms of the fallen. He suggested you take allies.
'These vile creatures have no respect for the dead, but I suppose there is little hope they will learn the meaning of honour.'
'You stand high in my esteem, [placeholder]. Your deeds here have been great. I foresee things greater still in your future.'
'Have you slain the Orcs and reclaimed the helms of their victims?'
Collect the helms of the fallen ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Return to Celephadh with the helms of the fallen
Collect the helms of the fallen ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
You have assisted the Rangers of Esteldín in their daily vigilance, maintaining that the lands of the North Downs are free from enemy control.
